snippet: On the opening night of the Republican National Convention, Donald J. Trump was conspicuously trying to conjure somebody else: Richard M. Nixon....
abstract: News Analysis; Donald J Trump appears to be channeling Richard Nixon on inaugural night of Republican National Convention, describing himself as law-and-order candidate who is trying to keep American safe; is seen by most voters as divisive and untrustworthy figure, and Nixon campaign seems to offer plausible political blueprint.

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and ALEXANDER BURNS
byline.contributor: Patrick Healy and Jonathan Martin contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: On the opening night of the Republican National Convention, Donald J. Trump was conspicuously trying to conjure somebody else: Richard M. Nixon.

headline.print_headline: In Trump’s Voice, It’s a New New Nixon
headline.main: It’s Donald Trump’s Convention. But the Inspiration? Nixon.
